name: The Library of Health (IAPSOP)
content:
The Library of Health (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: The Library of Health Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Library of Health, The. 1897-1900 Monthly New York, NY. Publisher: Alliance Publishing Company. Editor: Charles Brodie Patterson. 1/1, May 1897-April 1900. 16 pp., $1.00 a year. The journal was a platitudinous series of ruminations by Patterson, on "Hidden Mysteries," "Power of the Will," "Spiritual Growth," etc. The journal’s prospectus called it "a serial publication devoted to advanced thought, giving special attention to questions bearing upon individual happiness, harmony, and health. An able exponent of the metaphysical principles of being." Offered with the Temple, May 1897, for the bargain price of $1.50 a year for both. At the time this was being published, Patterson was also editing Mind. NYPL. Issues:Library of Health V1 1897-1898 Library of Health V3 1899-1900
